Package ru.nsu.lebedev.pizzeria

Class Json

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.lebedev.pizzeria.Json
public final class Json extends Object
Utility class for JSON serialization and deserialization using Jackson. This class follows the Single Responsibility Principle by focusing solely on JSON conversion. Moreover, by relying on the abstract marker interface Serializable, it observes the Dependency Inversion Principle. Note: The parameter type Serializable is a marker interface used to indicate that an object for JSON.

      Returns:
      the JSON string representation of the object.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during serialization.

      Parameters:
      object - an instance of a class implementing Serializable.
      outputStream - the output stream to which the JSON data is written.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during serialization.

      Deserializes a JSON string into an object of the specified type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the returned object
      Parameters:
      inputString - the JSON string to be deserialized
      type - the target class type
      Returns:
      an instance of type T deserialized from the JSON string
      Throws:
      ParsingException - if an error occurs during parsing

    • deserialize

      public static <T extends JsonSerializable> T deserialize(InputStream inputStream, Class<T> type) throws ParsingException
      Deserializes JSON data from an input stream into an object of the specified type. The method reads the input stream using UTF-8 encoding and converts it into the target object.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the returned object
      Parameters:
      inputStream - the input stream containing JSON data
      type - the target class type
      Returns:
      an instance of type T deserialized from the JSON input stream
      Throws:
      ParsingException - if an error occurs during parsing
